list_definition.definition: a run or running race performed at high speed over a short distance

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He ran up the road at a sprint.

list_definition.definition: to run at full speed especially (in) a race

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He sprinted (for) the last few hundred metres.
